column4: hi, can i in anyway take a live-cd and modify it with all the things i want in it and put me as root in it before i install it into a machine? or do i need to install it on a machine before i can do anything to it?
by default u ar root when u install it
but can i make my own account in it and that will stick throughout the install
nope  i dnt know about that . but u can do it on a pendrive
